public TextComponent setClickAction(@NotNull

        • open_url

        • open_file

        • run_command

        • suggest_command

        • change_page

      • setHoverAction

        @NotNull
public TextComponent setHoverAction(@NotNull
                                             java.lang.String action)

        Sets the action to be performed when the component is hovered over. Hover action is set to 'show_text' by default. Possible actions include:

        • show_text

        • show_achievement

        • show_item

        • show_entity

        Parameters:
        action - the hover action
